result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
CASES:  15CT60 & 15CM293 & 16CM171.  Attorney Dan Firkus in court.  Defendant Justin L Tretsven not in court. Prosecuting Atty Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for State of Wisconsin.   NE-Clerk 8:45 am.  8:46 adj.  

DEF appears with Atty. Firkus.  9:35 back on.  CT questions DEF as to whereabouts.  ADA agreement - joint recommendation.  DEF S&T.  DEF enters G pleas.  CT accepts pleas of G and enters JOC.  CT reads VI statement.  Atty. Firkus argument. 


15CT60 - CNT 1 DEF plea of G  - CNTS 2, 3, & 4 R/I and dismissed CT accepts J/R, 10 days in PCJ to begin prior to 11/26/16,  subject to good time & huber, 0 days credit, $1379.00 fine & costs, no DNA surcharge,  ab sol.,  AODA assess. and comply, 12 month rev. credit of admin, IID in all vehicles, bond applied to fines and costs, and pp for balance owed.
                              
15CM293 - R/I dismissed

16CM171 - CNT 1  DEF plea of G, CNT 2 DEF plea G - CNTS 3 & 4 R/I and dismissed - - CT w/h sent.  18 months prob.,  poss early release upon rec. of Prob., AODA assess. and comply to recommendations, ab. sob., no illegal  sub.,  20 hrs com. serv., bank 60 days cond. time, $265.60 fine & costs on both CNTS 1 & 2, 1 DNA $200.00 surcharge - indeg., opportunity for expungment, and appear to Probation today. 10:10 adj.
Final pre-trial on June 10, 2016 at 11:30 am.

CASES: 15CT60 & 15CM293. Defendant Justin L Tretsven in court with attorney Dan Firkus.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 1:49 pm.  CT-warrants quashed, bonds reinstated.  JA to set for next hearing w/ counsel.  1:51 pm adj.

CASES: 15CT60, 15CM293 Defendant Justin L Tretsven not in court. Atty Firkus appears. Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   KJB- Clerk. 905am CT- cancelled analyst for JT due to no contact w/atty. State req warrant. CT auth & issues warrant. 905AM ADJ.

CASES:  15CM293 & 15CT60.  Defendant Justin L Tretsven in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 1:13 PM.  CT-warrants quashed.  Bond reinstated.  Counsel to set for hearing w/ JA if needed.  Bond cont.  1:16 pm adj.

CASES:  15CT60, 15CM293.  Attorney Daniel E. Firkus in court.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  BJM-clerk 12:14 pm CT - Def recv'd notice of today's date in court.  CT - warrant issued.  12:15 pm adj.
